Package org.extremecomponents.table.callback

Interface Summary
FilterRowsCallback  
RetrieveRowsCallback  
SortRowsCallback  
 

Class Summary
CallbackUtils Deprecated. Use RetrievalUtils now.
FilterPredicate Use the Jakarta Collections predicate pattern to filter out the table.
LimitCallback Handles the pagination feature.
NullSafeBeanComparator Override BeanComparator to workaround the NestedNullException thrown by PropertyUtils.getProperty(...) when a parent object in the hierarchy is null.
ProcessRowsCallback The default implementation of the callbacks that handle the retrieving, filtering, and sorting of the collection that gets passed to the eXtremeTable.
